notes:
## NYA Core 3.1.0 - Test Build

### New Features
- Plugin SDK for custom UI components
- Modular game plugin structure
- Practice mode save state sync
- Splits overlay scaling in preview

### Improvements
- Updated preset row button layout
- Custom game delete button styling
- Plugin details loading for custom games
- Splits fill width when resizing horizontally

### Bug Fixes
- Fix playtime tracking not updating
- Fix preset modal not closing when clicking outside
